mesquite.lib

Class TaxaDisplayDrawnExtra

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.TaxaDisplayExtra
      • mesquite.lib.TaxaDisplayDrawnExtra
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listable, OwnedByModule

    public abstract class TaxaDisplayDrawnExtra
extends TaxaDisplayExtra
    A subclass of TaxaDisplayExtra. Used only so that taxa drawing knows that these are drawn above the taxa and can be reordered..
